v.v: Yahweh our Lord, people all over the world know that you are very great!
You have taught little children and infants to praise you;
I look up at the sky at night
It is amazing to me that you think about people,
You made the angels in heaven to be only a little more important than we are;
You put us in charge of everything that you made;

v: We see your greatness every time we look toward the heavens!
they cause your enemies and those who try to get revenge on you to be silent.
and see the things that you have made—
the moon and the stars that you have set in place.
that you are concerned about us humans!
you caused us to be like kings!
you gave us authority over all things—
and everything else that swims in the seas.
people all over the world know that you are very great!
